```{r, message=FALSE}
library(rlist)
library(magrittr)
library(rjson)
library(pipeR)
```


```{r}
base_url <- "https://www.guidetopharmacology.org/services/"
target <- paste(base_url, "targets", sep = "")
```


```{r}
interactions <- list.load(file = "interactions.json")
interactions %>% class()

list.map(interactions, ligandId) %>% head()

interactions %>% 
    list.count(type == "Agonist")
```
